verses.verse: ((Prov. 3:32; John 7:17)) The secret of the LORD is with those who fear Him, And He will show them His covenant.
((Ps. 123:2; 141:8)) My eyes are ever toward the LORD, For He shall pluck my feet out of the net.
(Ps. 69:16) Turn Yourself to me, and have mercy on me, For I am desolate and afflicted.
The troubles of my heart have enlarged; Bring me out of my distresses!
(2 Sam. 16:12; Ps. 31:7) Look on my affliction and my pain, And forgive all my sins.
Consider my enemies, for they are many; And they hate me with cruel hatred.
Keep my soul, and deliver me; Let me not be ashamed, for I put my trust in You.
Let integrity and uprightness preserve me, For I wait for You.
((Ps. 130:8)) Redeem Israel, O God, Out of all their troubles!
A Prayer for Divine Scrutiny and Redemption A Psalm of David. ([1]) Vindicate me, O LORD, For I have walked in my integrity. I have also trusted in the LORD; I shall not slip.
(Ps. 17:3; 139:23) Examine me, O LORD, and prove me; Try my mind and my heart.
For Your lovingkindness is before my eyes, And (2 Kin. 20:3; Ps. 86:11) I have walked in Your truth.
